sub_title: NLP Master Practitioner | A transformational coach |  Customer Experience Manager | Personal Growth
summary:
I am an educated NLP Master Practitioner and a Social Panorama Consult. My focus and passion lie in working with individuals who are navigating changes and pursuing personal growth. I aim to help them rediscover their resourcefulness, creativity, and readiness.

Ultimately, my mission is to facilitate the development of your authentic self, helping you tap into your inner strength and power. I aim to strengthen your courage, mindset, and ability to align with life's flow. This approach applies not only to individuals but also to the business world, influencing how they operate, think, and act.

My history:
Over the past 20 years, I have been immersed in the fashion retail industry, with the most recent 13 years dedicated to leadership, team management, and delivering exceptional customer experiences. Through diverse roles at the corporate level, I have gained extensive expertise as both an expert and a leader. Guided by values and commercial purpose, I have been a hands-on leader with a creative and proactive mindset, driving both business and people toward success.

How I work:
I leverage my 20 years of business experience along with my education and training in NLP and coaching methodologies. This combination allows me to facilitate and coach individuals, groups, and companies. In company and community coaching, I guide interactions, foster co-creation skills, and deepen the understanding of purpose and values. Together, we bring bold visions to reality.

In individual coaching, I offer a highly personalized approach. Expect an atmosphere of openness, warmth, and complete non-judgment as we work together.

Working languages: Finnish and English

profile_positions.description:
A new Way of transformational coaching which leads to better well-being. Coaching for individuals, groups and companies. 

PERSONAL COACHING: 
Transformational coaching is solution-focused, and a deep-rooted experiential process where first issues are experienced - then understood.  
My coaching sessions are always highly personalised. coaching is goal-oriented and focuses on how you can move from where you are now to where you would like to be. We concentrate on different and strong NLP + social panorama methods, technics of MSP (mental space psychology) and in addition rooted conversations.

I hold a safe environment for you. An atmosphere of openness, warmth, and total non-judgment is what you can expect from me.  

There are certain main elements in my coaching: 
- identify current situation 
- goal setting 
- tailor made processes
- accountability 

COMPANIES & GROUPS: 
In company/community coaching, I support the holistic growth of the organization, I guide the interaction, the skills of co-creation and the deepening of understanding of purpose and values. 
Teams can develop an emotional bond, together we increase understanding of different strengths and we bring bold visions in reality.

"Curiosity is the desire to find a bridge between knowledge and learning new skills. It facilitates a deeper connection to ourselves, others and the world around us." Elina
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
Coaching newcomers in their journey to realizing their entrepreneurial goals at Forward•Inc. 
A coach’s main objective is to support the entrepreneur on a strategic level by testing key assumptions, setting realistic goals, providing feedback, and bring best out in the entrepreneurs. 

Forward•Inc is Netherlands-based, internationally operating organisation devoted to helping newcomers pursue their entrepreneurial dreams. This is done by empowering them to launch, grow, fund, and sustain their own businesses. Forward’s programs assist aspiring entrepreneurs with everything from concept development and becoming pitch-ready to implementing marketing strategies and scaling their businesses.
profile_positions.title: Facilitator

profile_positions.description:
Achievements & Responsibilities: 
- Worked in Amsterdam store which is one of the TOP 10 store in globally
- Drove people and business equally successful (42 team members)  
- Increased overall sales and profit KPI's and customer satisfaction KPI's. Some highlights:
      * increased conversion with 6,5%
      * decreased sickness massively 14% > 2%
      * Increased planning of selling accurate with 20% 
      * Increased documented feedback process with 60% 

PROUD OF: 
- Coached and trained managers in all levels using coaching methods and leadership practises 
Implemented company strategy through a modern approach to trainings, leadership, teamwork and practical solutions
- Increased and maximized the best customer experience through SMART goals, leadership and store trainings.
- Responsible for developing and leading a team with focus on store operations, selling KPI's, customer needs and the best customer experience. 
- Built a successful team and talent pipeline.
- Created day to day commercial routines with follow up tools to meet customer needs and to be relevant. 
- Started to work with RFID system, setting goals and follow up tools together with the store management team.
 
A main responsibility of the selling, operations, team and customer service. And an overall responsibility of a customer experience.  Leading the team with values, leadership and feedback culture. Addition to that store manager ensures that team has development plans, structured performance tools and potential and the environment to grow and develop themselves. 
Store manager is responsible for maximizing the selling and profit by creating a strategy in yearly basis which is followed up in monthly / weekly / quarterly.
profile_positions.title: Store Manager & Trainer

profile_positions.description:
Achievements & Responsibilities: 
- Worked as a Head of Visual department in NL. Being direct manager for 5 experts and a function manager for 4 area visual merchandisers.  (Overall responsible for 110 stores in NL)  
- Increased selling KPI’s together with the sales team.
- Launched a cross functional commercial planning method (OMNI) to make sure to meet the local customer demand and be relevant. 

PROUD OF: 
- Developed and lead team of high performing professionals with focus on selling KPI's, merchandising, customer profiles, key focuses and ensuring the best customer experience. 
- Coached and developed the team to improve a customer experience through training structure, garment presentation and cross-functions with other teams such as merchandisers, marketing/communication and finance.
- Designed and launched several training days in a yearly basis 
- Built the visual strategy for entire organisation 2017-2018 by launching SMART goal method, developing new structures and focusing efficient and smart solutions regarding operational routines. 

Main responsibilities:

As a country visual manage you are overall responsible for customer experience in the stores and secure garment presentation and visual execution. Main purpose is to increase customer experience and maximise the selling. You lead the visual team with a passion, clear expectations and feedback culture. Securing country sales planning - information- Follow Up -reviews are key responsibilities with other stakeholders, merchandising, communication/ marketing, controlling , HR, expansion. County visual manager works together with the country management team to set commercial goals.
profile_positions.title: Country visual Manager Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
Achievements & Responsibilities: 
- Worked as a Head of Visual department in Finland, Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania. Being a direct manager for 4 visual experts and function manager for 4 area visual merchandisers (Responsible for 75 stores in 4 areas across in Finland and Baltics)
- Increased overall selling KPI's and Brand Tracker with the sales team. 

PROUD OF:
- Implemented company strategy and values at all times, focusing on customer needs in each markets  and strong visual/ operational routines.   
- Designed and launched several training programs for visuals in all levels 
- Was responsible of recruiting and training process in 2012-2013 when company expanded to Baltic countries. (45 VMs recruited and trained)  
- Opened successfully 3 flagship stores and 8 red/ blue stores in Baltics  
- Built professional and successful visual team and a strong pipeline.
- Developed and launched Country Commercial Planner to maximise the selling and ensure the best customer experience.
- Launched SMART goal method for vm teams in different countries as well worked with them accordingly.
- Increased and developed customer experience in each countries trough clear structures, goals and leadership and cross-functional teamwork. 


Country Visual manager is overall responsible for the customer experience and how the garments are presented in the store. Main purpose is to increase shopping experience, being relevant and maximize the sales.  As a country visual manager you responsible to create overall strategy and set country goals together with crucial stakeholders , such as merchandising, communication / marketing, controlling, HR and expansion.
profile_positions.title: Country Visual Manager Finland & Baltics

profile_positions.description:
- As indoor & window responsible you are responsible to create specific visual guidelines for each customer groups ( ladies, men, kids, home ) This is done together with other teams such as merchandisers and marketing
- Created country VM guidelines for country specific projects 
- Supported area visuals
- Started and launched planning / ordering tool for vm materials
- Roll-out regarding NCG material and purchasing processes 
- Strong collaboration with Contribution Center teams, Finance department and Operational teams to secure optimal outcome 
- Secured yearly budget planning and follow up with different stake holders    
- Store visits together with area functions
profile_positions.title: Indoor & Window and Material & Ordering Responsible in Finland

profile_positions.description:
Achievements & Responsibilities: 
-  Worked as a trainer and coached and trained +30 senior VMs 
- As area visual merchandiser you are responsible for supporting the sales and profit goals in your area. This is done by setting the strategy to deliver the best customer experience. The role ensures that area and stores have successful visual merchandisers and as area visual you support and coach their development , as well working with succession planning , talent development and structured performance management for the team based on results, values and leadership. 

- Created and built successful visual routines in Area/regio
- Increased sales together with Area team with +15%
- Developed and launched visual planning tool to entire area team (20 stores)
- Worked successfully with talent pipeline and leadership
profile_positions.title: Area Visual Merchandiser in Finland
